ygData.subject: Re: weapons upgrade?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know what the cost of the polished granite tomahawk is on your server but on Bertox they can be had for around 250p...should be less on Innoruuk
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know what the cost of the polished granite tomahawk is on your
server but on Bertox they can be had for around 250p...should be less on
Innoruuk becuase it is an older server.

The PGT is a great weapon, the berserker effect often enables me to engage
and defeat mobs which are of higher level than I can without the axe.

The screaming mace is also a good choice and it can be had for less than
100p on Bertox.

-----Original Message-----
From: Trent Carroll <trent@...>
To: Warriors_Eq@Onelist. Com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 12:37 PM
Subject: [warriors_eq] weapons upgrade?


>From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>
>I have a level 14 Tier'dal warrior named Stilette on Innoruuk.
>
>Her current weapon setup is:
>Right hand Dragoon Dirk (Lore, magic)
>Left hand Tentacle Whip (magic)
>
>I would like to upgrade the tentacle whip to something else. If you know
>the stats on it, they suck, and I could care less about the lifetap effect.
>The replacement weapon must do magic damage. What is a decent piercing or
>1h slashing weapon for 200plat or less. I would be willing to switch to a
>1h blunt weapon but would prefer not to. Due to my race I will most likely
>be purchasing in the commonlands, Oasis, or Ro. I will not be traveling to
>any of the other continents.
>
>How much do blackened boots go for BTW?
>
>Kindrael
>
